file_name.description: Full path to summary statistics. e.g., s3://rti...

output_name.description: What name would you like the new file to be called after performing liftover?

sep.description: Field separator character in your sumstats. e.g., '	'

chrom_name.description: Name of the chromosome column. e.g., 'Chromosome'

pos_name.description: Name of the position column. e.g., 'Position_b37'

ref_genome.description: What genome build your sumstats are currently in. e.g., GRCh37

convert_ref_genome.description: What genome build you would like to liftover to. e.g., GRCh38

mem.description: Amount of RAM. Default is cpu*2
